Posts.Content: PowerInPink wrote: Hey Everyone, Thought this may interest some of you.... Under Armour's "Power in Pink" charity is currently accepting stories of triumph and survivorship for their 2010 Power in Pink campaign. They are accepting submissions from now until July 15 and will be selecting 3 women to be the face of their 2010 campaign. If you are interested in reading some of the stories or would like to submit your own, you can visit the link below. http://www.underarmour.com/shop/us/en/ua-stories/power-in-pink Thanks for reading! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Under Armour's Power In Pink: Survivor Search PowerInPink jenn1975
